Description: Based on Wrestling System flowchart with full executable rules

column9: Both fighters standing in close grip
On back with opponent between legs
One leg trapped by bottom fighter
Groin Strike Escape: Auto-slip once per fight
Redirect: Use attacker's STR for throw damage
Silent Choke: No noise on KO

column6: Move to guard from worse position
Move to turtle from any bad position

column3: Keep current hold active next turn
Apply arm lock or choke or other hold
Try to get free from hold
All bonuses defined in Sheet 7 above
STR 50+ enables Crushing Hold per Sheet 8
Grappling is alternative to standard attack at Step 2
